Uses of Class
org.strongback.command.CommandGroup

  • Packages that use CommandGroup 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.command  

    • Uses of CommandGroup in org.strongback.command

      Methods in org.strongback.command that return CommandGroup 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandGroup CommandGroup.fork(Command forked)
      Add a Command that executes independently of any other Commands in this group.
      static CommandGroup CommandGroup.runSequentially(Command... commands)
      Creates a single CommandGroup that executes several Commands in sequential order.
      static CommandGroup CommandGroup.runSimultaneously(Command... commands)
      Creates a single CommandGroup that executes several Commands simultaneously.
      CommandGroup CommandGroup.sequentially(Command... commands)
      Creates a single CommandGroup that executes several Commands in sequential order.
      CommandGroup CommandGroup.simultaneously(Command... commands)
      Wraps several Commandss in a single CommandGroup that executes them simultaneously.
